column1: sent_more
Old people put on weight and get fat.
My friend passed out from the alcohol because he was only 18.
Her husband John came in and said what an old idiot she is always losing things.
Taylor knew she had to take care of the seniors who couldn't take care of theirselves.
They were the only seniors at the waterpark.
Teenagers waste all their time playing video games.
Still, the king refused his services, citing his age.
The old man could not help but sit and ponder for hours.
What is a man of your age doing alone on a playground?
Kacey failed to follow the instructions, since she had a hard time handling all the cake mix as a kindergartener.
Scott did not care, and decided to bankrupt young Simon.
Nick was a millenial so he isn't good in person, if it's not on a phone he can't deal with people.
The older you get your brain slows down and you have to edit so many times to try to get it right.
Joyce didn't care about the weird looks she got from the old American neighborhood.
The young boy enjoyed the new video game
Josh found a lot of fun in the pirate ship as an eighth grader.
Teenagers never listen to their parents because they think they know everything.
They also had no faith in their captain, due to his extreme age.
At the shooting range, the little boy had trouble handling the gun.
The old man had a bald head.
Sam was 90 years old so he was too weak to fix it.
I really don't understand why teenagers like chewing gum so much..
The young don't understand that difficulties make you ready for a full life.
Mike was old and his body couldn't take the damage.
I do not dare disagree with an old man like you.
Fena Dim was an old hag who couldn't even control her own bowels.
Minors under 18 are defiant and selfish
When you are older you can't seem to hold it at all, that's why retirement homes smell like urine.
He couldn't stand the old lady's accent.
It amazed me how old people could stomach this coco.
The old woman played Bingo at the community center every Saturday night.
Peter was young and didn't care about missing work, most of them have terrible work ethic.
They didn't believe the secret, chalking it up to him just being too old to make sense.
The elderly woman could not figure out the easy task of sending an email.
My boyfriend just couldn't stand that my parents were in their late 80s.
Their star quarterback was too old to make the playoffs.
The teenagers had very healthy eyes.
If you feel too old to keep up with my speed, you'll have to go.
The old woman spent all her time knitting. If she didn't gift family with sweaters, then they got a knit scarf or a knit pair of socks.
The child was loud an annoying when they cried in public.
The teenage boy never stood up straight and always slouched in his chair.
He almost got badly injured: classical teenager foolishness..
The smoke came from a bunch of old people who were cooking something outside in a cauldron like old hags do.
He did not deserve that promotion because he was so old.
The groups of teenagers was rowdy and rambunctious.
Perhaps it was her advanced age that she could no longer follow simple instructions that was the problem.
The mom was already exhausted despite just waking up since she was way too old to take care of a toddler.
Children are often disrespectful of the elderly.
At 80 years old it is hard to stay up late without a nap.
Despite my old age, I was able to see clearly in the storm.
Her grandmother could not figure out how to use the Internet.
Our granddaughter said we couldn't like Winnie the Pooh so much because we were too old.
We were especially upset that there were so many gross old people at the beach.
The elderly man forgot to turn off the television and fell asleep in his chair.
College students are not careful with their spending.
She calls Ron an ignorant old man for not remembering.
Jake was nearing his 80th birthday. He spent most of his time either fishing by the lake or napping.
Old people are feeble and worthless.
Kids do not understand about health.
They say those cougars are much more experienced.
He was proud of apprehending the teenage criminal.
The old man hobbled out of the theater, disgusted by what he saw.
She was so mad that he was so much older in age than her.
They were too tired, like pestered old men.
Children are picky eaters and are never willing to try anything new.
The people there were all millenials, layabouts who couldn't look you in the eye or show up on time anywhere.
You got the physical resistance of an elderly man..
The old man couldn't recall what his instructor taught him as he struggled to radio for assistance.
The elderly lady lived at home alone with many cats.
As usual I was given dirty looks for still being part of the workforce at 80.
Tom is the typical old man, just sitting around on a bench all day, doing nothing.
Naomi had back surgery and was in agony due to the fact she was old.
She didn't want to admit it, but she was too old to use technology..
